thread.title: BRIEF-Paratek's New Drug Applications For Oral And Intravenous Omadacycline Accepted For Priority Review By FDA

title: BRIEF-Paratek's New Drug Applications For Oral And Intravenous Omadacycline Accepted For Priority Review By FDA
text:
April 4, 2018 / 8:16 PM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Paratek's New Drug Applications For Oral And Intravenous Omadacycline Accepted For Priority Review By FDA Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 4 (Reuters) - Paratek Pharmaceuticals Inc: 
* PARATEKâ€™S NEW DRUG APPLICATIONS FOR ORAL AND INTRAVENOUS OMADACYCLINE ACCEPTED FOR PRIORITY REVIEW BY FDA * PDUFA ACTION DATE IN OCTOBER 2018 
* IN NDA ACCEPTANCE LETTER, FDA STATED THAT NO FILING OR POTENTIAL REVIEW ISSUES WERE IDENTIFIED AT THE TIME Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
